last_episode_to_air.name: Not One Shred of Evidence
last_episode_to_air.overview: DNA testing and a close examination of the evidence reveal the truth about Lucas and the officers who let the real killers get away with murder.

name: The Confession Killer
overview: Henry Lee Lucas rose to infamy when he confessed to hundreds of unsolved murders. This docuseries examines the truth -- and horrifying consequences.

episodes.name: Everything Except Poison
episodes.overview: The hunt for two missing women leads authorities to Henry Lee Lucas. In court, he drops a bombshell, setting off a media circus and riveting a nation.

episodes.name: Make It Strawberry
episodes.overview: At Georgetown, Lucas regales visiting officers with stories to clear murder cases. But one Lubbock family will do their own police work to refute him.

episodes.name: War in Waco
episodes.overview: Suspicions about Lucasâ€™s confessions crescendo as a front-page investigative story hits the newsstands, and an ambitious DA takes on the Texas Rangers.

episodes.name: All the Damn Lies
episodes.overview: As families long for closure, the manipulation continues. Years later, on death row, Lucas steps up the fight for his life. But the lies don't stop.

episodes.name: Not One Shred of Evidence
episodes.overview: DNA testing and a close examination of the evidence reveal the truth about Lucas and the officers who let the real killers get away with murder.
